text:
When I was little, the world was really different from now. The 21st century had just began and many ways of communication had seen the light throught the years. One of the most important for me wad the creation of the laptop. Appeared in 1981, the first laptop was an incredible revolution for those who needs to work in unusual places like planes or trains. Its size greatly reduced allowed people to transport it wherever they wanted, and its weight of just 12 Kilos made its use very practical. However, the use of these laptops was strictelly professional. Nowadays, laptops have evolved and offer even more possibilities. First, the use of these tools had become more recreational over the years, and it's now possible to watch movie, play video games or even listen to music with a laptop thanks to the internet. Of course, it still almost essential to possess a laptop for work, but they not reduce to this utility. Then, laptops have change the world of communication, with the apparition of social media and others platform. Meeting people virtually is now possible and available for everyone, for exemple, many people now have friends they haven't meet in real life who lives miles from them. But, the more impressive evolution is that now, we can access to almost every knowledges on earth. Discovering something is now so easy, and open the doors of a new world of consciousness.
 I find that in the first place this evolution cannot be wrong for the humankind. Everything is easelly available, even a child can make a search on the internet. Working on a laptop is also pleasant and can be done everywhere. But I think these developements can be really dangerous on the long term. Knowledge is now so easy to access that many of us have stop thinking by themselves. If they want to answer the easiest question, internet and the laptop know the answer, if they need life advice, the same thing happen. So many people now can't live without a laptop, without being connected to the world and the others. Children are no longer children and many spend their day in front of a screen, watching mediocre content. But there isn't only bad things about these laptop. It allowed everyone to know and communicate freely, to discover and learn.
